hero.title: Building a skilled, adaptable, and inclusive workforce
hero.description: Access employment services, benefits, and support programmes that help New Zealanders succeed

ei.title: Jobseeker Support
ei.description: Financial help while you look for work
ei.details: Jobseeker Support helps you if you're looking for work, can't work full-time because of illness, injury or disability, or are affected by an emergency.

oas.title: NZ Superannuation
oas.description: Payment for New Zealanders 65 and over
oas.details: NZ Superannuation is a fortnightly payment for people 65 years old and over, who normally live in New Zealand at the time they apply.

cpp.title: KiwiSaver
cpp.description: Voluntary savings scheme to help with retirement
cpp.details: KiwiSaver is a voluntary, work-based savings initiative to help set you up for your retirement.

jobSearch.title: Jobs and Skills
jobSearch.description: Find employment opportunities across New Zealand
jobSearch.details: Search for jobs, get career advice and access training opportunities.

benefitsFinder.title: Benefits Guide
benefitsFinder.description: Find out what financial help you may be entitled to
benefitsFinder.details: Answer a few questions to see what financial assistance you may be able to get.

chat.title: Ask EVA
chat.subtitle: Employment Virtual Assistant
chat.placeholder: How can I help you today?
